# contactDelegate

**Instance Property**

A delegate that is called when two physics bodies come in contact with each other.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var contactDelegate: (any SCNPhysicsContactDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A contact is created when two physics bodies overlap and one of the physics bodies has a [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsBody/collisionBitMask] property that overlaps with the other body’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsBody/categoryBitMask] property.

## Detecting Contacts Between Physics Bodies

- **contactTestBetween(_:_:options:)**: Checks for contacts between two physics bodies.
- **contactTest(with:options:)**: Checks for contacts between one physics body and any other bodies in the physics world.

items.description: Checks for contacts between two physics bodies.
items.name: contactTestBetween(_:_:options:)

items.description: Checks for contacts between one physics body and any other bodies in the physics world.
